extendedInfo.description: ****************************IMP Info:ROOT USERS ONLY!* *******************************************************Usage Info: THIS APP IS ONLY FOR CHECKROM USERS *Device Supported: Samsung Galaxy S3 (GT-I9300)***************************We at CheckROM are renowned to give the user the ability to modify/customize there phones on the go with what ever they can think of and for that we developed our KitchenPro app that allows the users to do so!KitchenPro V1 was pretty famous by itself on all major Android blogs and android forums, for the flexibility it provides.So we merged more of our ideas and revamped our kitchen app even further by adding to it unimaginable features no one has ever heard of or seen in the community & this gave rise to KitchenPro V2 a market in itself!Me and Leomar75 have been working on this release like crazy for the past 2months and time has come we show you what we can do in this community and what team spirit gives birth to!Also we have seen that almost 40% of the users Don know how to put the kitchen to maximal use and hence shy away in using the app, so i decided to do a Preview & Tutorial explaining everything you need to know about how to work with this great and unique app!ATM this App will work with a Samsung Galaxy Note & Samsung Galaxy S2 which are running our CheckROM Build's for the specific device CheckROM Kitchen Pro V2:http://bit.ly/KitchenProV2Thanks Every one for showing us there Support and appreciation!***************Pro Features***************-New Splash screen -Download Speed info-SD Card Space Warning-New Rating and Comment Layouts -New Server Info and Star Rating's-Full & Perfect Landscape view compact-able-More than one preview for the themes available-Slider-able & Select-able ICS Style custom View-pager-Auto Device Detect and Auto Server Selection Capability-Redesigned UI of Mod's,Animated Title,Preview's and Review Tab-Added Video Guides in the app itself for new people to checkrom -Added Download & Install Packages tab for faster Install of Packs-Added the Ability in Browse/Install the ability to flash .tar,CWM.zip and zImages

reviews.title: Not compatible with my device??
reviews.comment: Why is it that starting from kitchen pro 2.45, google play states that it is no longer compatible with my device (samsung galaxy S2 GT-I9100)?

reviews.title: Crashes ever so often
reviews.comment: Im not so sure why it keeps crashing all of a sudden. But its screwing up my phone. Its been a pleasure using checkrom. Guess its time to move on.

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: All has been said already about how awesome this Rom is... Can\'t wait for an ICS version of it :)   Yet, I would appreciate it very much if you could make some new themes based on the ICS theme...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Must admit i was a big ios fan and regretted buying my S2, that was until i installed checkrom\'s revolution HD with kitchen pro installed. This is everything thats great about android, way better than stock stuff and ios, simply love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for ics version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s amazing
reviews.comment: One of the best ideas with that came up in customizing rooted phones. ROM for itself is already brilliant, but with this app, it takes it to a whole new level of personalizing your phone! I recommend it to everyone, especially to the users that like ultimate personalization of their phone. It\'s even noob friendly and there is a great tutorial on how to use KitchenPro or any other thing related to this ROM. Developers, you got my support!
reviews.author: A Google User
